name: Tank Raid (itch)
description:
Tank Raid is a turn-based strategy fighting game in which you are raiding the land in your new tank.

Controls

Mouse for Clicking on Weapons / Opponents

or

1, 2, 3, 4 - Weapons (Standard, Special, Health and Shields)

M - Turn Music on/off

Have fun!

Coded by Sikosis - http://games.sikosis.com/
